name: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Eagle
desc:
2 Beast-Warrior monsters
You can only Special Summon "Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Eagle(s)" once per turn. You can activate the effects of "Fire Fist" monsters without sending "Fire Fist" or "Fire Formation" cards from your hand or field to the GY. You can target 1 "Fire Formation" Spell/Trap you control or in your GY; return it to your hand, then send 1 "Fire Fist" monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Eagle" once per turn.
str1: Apply "Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Eagle"'s effect to avoid paying the cost?
str2: Return a Fire Formation to hand, then send 1 Fire Fist to GY
